name: Re-pair (riks)
description:
Horror in it's purist form. Race against the clock before it's too late in a game that should not exist, and does not exist. Get ready to... RE-PAIR! 

Re-pair was made for the 2020 Global Game Jam in 3 days by 

Christian Hotte - Programming

Kris Camp - Art, Animation, Design https://twitter.com/riksreverse / https://www.artstation.com/riksreverse

Tobey-Julian Joseph - Music Composer, and Sound Design https://twitter.com/calzonesrgreat / https://soundcloud.com/tobey-joseph

Jaden Servant - Art, Animation

"The Elevator Bossa Nova: www.bensound.com" or "Royalty Free Music from Bensound"

Remixed by Tobey-Julian Joseph
